title: Lump sum investments involve risk: Dhirendra Kumar
text: Lump sum investments involve risk: Dhirendra Kumar 31 Aug 2015, 2:31PM IST Copy URL Embed In the personal finance segment, CEO of Value Research Dhirendra Kumar Singh advised investors about investment ideas on mutual funds as well as gave advice to farmers not to investment lump sum as it involves risk factor more. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes 50 views
